p: Pathologically, all patients with locally advanced gastric cancer received postoperative adjuvant chemotherapy (a 3 week cycle SOX regime). S-1, 40-60 mg (40 mg when BSA < 1.25 m 2, 60 mg when BSA > 1.5 m 2), twice per day, Day 1–14; Oxaliplatin (130 mg/m 2) was given intravenously at the first day of each cycle. Toxicity of the regime was graded based on the Common Terminology Criteria for Adverse Events version 4.0.
